summary: Container class that encapsulates the outputs of a vision transformer model, including the pooled image embeddings, the final hiddenâ€‘state sequence, and optionally the full list of hidden states and attention matrices for each layer.
business_intent: Expose model results in a structured form so downstream applications (e.g., image retrieval, classification, multimodal fusion) can readily consume the pooled embeddings and internal representations for further processing or analysis.
